title: Horse In The Sea - I Order The Sun To Shine On Everyone
description:
Horse In The Sea is the moniker for the lyrical and musical compositions of Joel Janis. Since its inception in 2007, the project has been produced and engineered by Nashville producer and recording artist Kyle Andrews. Janis and Andrews first met in grade school and began trading demo cassette tapes in the mid-1990s.

Horse in the Sea has played over 200 shows in support of this album, including multiple sold-out performances in Chicago.

The band is currently working on their highly-anticipated 2010 release, entitled Grieve. Grieve is a conceptual sound recording based on people afflicted with and affected by psychological disorders.
